page.title: 17SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: In Port Glasgow there are several important science and technical-based industries. Most of these are located in Devol industrial estate. These industries include Aqua-Marine products which produce spare parts for marine equipment, Sangamo which uses micro-technology in the production of time-control meters.AMP make components for American equipment, including aircraft. The local shipbuilding industry depends heavily on the latest technology particularly in the construction of oil-rigs. { Computers}now play a major part in the school, shops and factories of Port Glasgow. Their uses range from education to stock control in both industry and commerce.{Science and {technology}has taken off in Port Glasgow.
